feels.name: Joy
feels.quote: In an hour’s tête-à-tête with Mr. Casaubon she talked to him with more freedom than she had ever felt before, even pouring out her joy at the thought of devoting herself to him, and of learning how she might best share and further all his great ends.

feels.name: Sadness
feels.quote: Dorothea was still hurt and agitated.

feels.name: Happiness
feels.quote: Nevertheless before the evening was at an end she was very happy.

feels.name: Surprise
feels.quote: Perhaps Celia had never turned so pale before.

feels.name: Fear
feels.quote: There was something funereal in the whole affair, and Mr. Casaubon seemed to be the officiating clergyman, about whom it would be indecent to make remarks.

feels.name: Tenderness
feels.quote: Oh, Dodo, I hope you will be happy.
